TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Lucius_Allen, title = Lucius_Allen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucius_Allen} }

S.FORM: Lucius Oliver Allen , Jr ga semong ppzuy mari lalu' niya' balay, 26 ryax 9 byacing 1947 kawas qu hintgan nya. 188 kunbun kinwagiq ru 79 kunkin kin'suw nya. ppzuy nya mari ga kmahang mari te suruw, tmasuq mqwas squ UCLA. Kawas te 1969, galun nqu Seattle SuperSonics (maki' squ te qutux hinguwi ran na pinwzyagan na' lga maki' te cyugal binkgan lalu' niya') ryax pizyuwi'an niya' mari' ga mnaki' sa Seattle SuperSonics, Milwaukee Bucks, Los Angeles Lakers ru Sacramento Kings. kinbleqan pinzyuwi'an niya mari kawas te 9407 ga (ptnaqun pspung kwara' inxalan niya pspung ga 13.4), kawas te 2205 qnol niya zikna tkran ga (ptnaqun pspung kwara' inxalan niya pspung ga 3.1), kawas te 3174 rnaw nya ga (ptnaqun pspung kwara' inxalan niya msspung ga 4.5) kinmuci' na minkirok mnagal Champion na NBA, mnagal Champion na NCAA sa kawas te (1967.1968) bniru' nha' ryax qnxan niya Kawas te 1969 ga mzyup kya NBA, 'aring kya squ ppzyuwi'an niya' mari' la. Kawas te 1971, pragan nha' squ rogak niya' sa raygak rmaw squ gluw na Milwaukee Bucks magal sa Champion na NBA. Kawas te 1979, spquzi' niyya' wagiq qu pinlukus niya niwan tmasuq kya pinzi'an niya pinzyuwi'an mari la. kawas te 1999, galan spzyang blaq balay sensyu mzyuwi' mari' na kocyu sa State of Kansas. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Locios Oliver Allen , Jr ga semong ppzoy mari lalo' niya' balay, 26 ryax 9 byacing 1947 kawas qo hintgan nya. 188 konbon kinwagiq ro 79 konkin kin'sow nya. ppzoy nya mari ga kmahang mari te sorow, tmasoq mqwas sqo UCLA. Kawas te 1969, galon nqo Seattle SoperSonics (maki' sqo te qotox hingowi ran na pinwzyagan na' lga maki' te cyogal binkgan lalo' niya') ryax pizyowi'an niya' mari' ga mnaki' sa Seattle SoperSonics, Milwaokee Bocks, Los Angeles Lakers ro Sacramento Kings. kinbleqan pinzyowi'an niya mari kawas te 9407 ga (ptnaqon pspong kwara' inxalan niya pspong ga 13.4), kawas te 2205 qnol niya zikna tkran ga (ptnaqon pspong kwara' inxalan niya pspong ga 3.1), kawas te 3174 rnaw nya ga (ptnaqon pspong kwara' inxalan niya msspong ga 4.5) kinmoci' na minkirok mnagal Champion na NBA, mnagal Champion na NCAA sa kawas te (1967.1968) bniro' nha' ryax qnxan niya Kawas te 1969 ga mzyop kya NBA, 'aring kya sqo ppzyowi'an niya' mari' la. Kawas te 1971, pragan nha' sqo rogak niya' sa raygak rmaw sqo glow na Milwaokee Bocks magal sa Champion na NBA. Kawas te 1979, spqozi' niyya' wagiq qo pinlokos niya niwan tmasoq kya pinzi'an niya pinzyowi'an mari la. kawas te 1999, galan spzyang blaq balay sensyo mzyowi' mari' na kocyo sa State of Kansas. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
